source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_SEQ_00<tab>Forgemaster H'naanza, head of Naldiq & Vymelli's, wants you to assist with the workload over at the Moraby Drydocks.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_SEQ_00<tab>甲冑師ギルドのギルドマスターで、ナルディク＆ヴィメリー社の社長でもあるハ・ナンザは、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>を、モラビー造船廠へ派遣したいようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_SEQ_01<tab>With her company struggling to complete construction of a massive warship due to a shortage of artisans, Forgemaster H'naanza has requested your assistance in handling any miscellaneous tasks. Your first job requires you to deliver a missive to Ahtbyrm, the head shipwright at the Moraby Drydocks.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_SEQ_01<tab>大型船を建造中のナルディク＆ヴィメリー社では、人手が不足しているということで、ハ・ナンザに手伝いを依頼された。手始めに、「モラビー造船廠」の筆頭造船師「アートビルム」へ「ナルディク＆ヴィメリー社の封書」を届けよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_SEQ_02<tab>The shipwrights at the Moraby Drydocks are working feverishly on construction of the Maelstrom's new warship, the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var>. Lend your aid to the overworked artisans and help them complete this towering symbol of Limsa Lominsa's glorious renewal.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_SEQ_02<tab>「モラビー造船廠」では、黒渦団の新造船「ヴィクトリー号」の建造が急ピッチで進められていた。リムサロ・ミンサ復興の象徴でもある「ヴィクトリー号」の完成に向け、多くの人を手助けしよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the missive to Ahtbyrm at the Moraby Drydocks.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_TODO_00<tab>モラビー造船廠のアートビルムにナルディク＆ヴィメリー社の封書を届ける

source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_HNAANZA_000_1<tab>What say you to taking on some work from Naldiq & Vymelli's? We've a great hulking warship to build and could certainly use an extra hand for any number of tasks.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_HNAANZA_000_1<tab>お前さん、信頼のおける冒険者のようだし、
ナルディク＆ヴィメリー社の手伝いをしてみないか？
うちは今、大型船を建造中で人手不足でね。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_HNAANZA_000_2<tab>For your first job, I need you to run this missive over to Ahtbyrm, the head shipwright at the Moraby Drydocks.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_HNAANZA_000_2<tab>手始めに、「モラビー造船廠」へひとっぱしりして、
この「ナルディク＆ヴィメリー社の封書」を
造船師筆頭の「アートビルム」に手渡してほしい。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_HNAANZA_000_3<tab>We forge most of the ship's bits and pieces here at the Armorers' Guild, but the actual construction takes place at the docks found in the south of lower La Noscea.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_HNAANZA_000_3<tab>船の部品なんかは、この工房でも制作してるが、
船の組み立ては、低地ラノシアの南にある
モラビー造船廠で行ってるのさ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_HNAANZA_000_4<tab>That's also where you'll find the main offices of Naldiq & Vymelli's. The Moraby Drydocks is one of Limsa Lominsa's most important districts─at least as far as I'm concerned─and I'm sure you'll not regret attuning yourself to the area's aetheryte.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_HNAANZA_000_4<tab>あそこは、ナルディク＆ヴィメリー社の本社があるし
エーテライトもある、リムサ・ロミンサ領の中でも
重要な場所だから、行って損はないよ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_HNAANZA_000_5<tab>If you've no confidence in your sense of direction, you'd be best served making use of the chocobo porters. First floor of the Mizzenmast, in case you were wondering.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_HNAANZA_000_5<tab>道に迷いたくないなら、「チョコボポーター」を使うといい。
ミズンマストの1階にいる係員に声をかけてみな。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_HNAANZA_000_6<tab>Should you choose to make the trek on your own two feet, leave the city through the Tempest Gate and follow the road south. May the Navigator guide your steps.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_HNAANZA_000_6<tab>徒歩で行くつもりなら、テンペスト陸門から出て、
南へ向かうことだね。それじゃ、急いで頼むよ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_AHTBYRM_000_11<tab>You have a missive for me from Forgemaster H'naanza? I assume it pertains to the pending arrival of the materials I ordered over a moon past. Let's see it, then.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_AHTBYRM_000_11<tab>ハ・ナンザ社長から封書を預かったって？
ふむ、発注していた部材の納期予定だな。
どれ、見せてみろ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_AHTBYRM_000_12<tab>Blast and botheration! Another delay? I am well aware of the shortage of skilled artisans, but this is insufferable!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_AHTBYRM_000_12<tab>くそっ、また納期が後ろに倒れちまうか……。
どこもかしこも人手不足とはいえ、まいったぜ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_AHTBYRM_000_13<tab><sigh> My apologies. The messenger does not deserve to bear the brunt of my frustration. Might I have your name?
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_AHTBYRM_000_13<tab>おっと、あんたに愚痴っても、仕方ないな。
届けてくれて、ありがとよ。
……で、あんたの名は？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_AHTBYRM_000_14<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, is it? Well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, this proud maiden you see taking shape before you is the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var>, the first new vessel to grace the docks since the Calamity.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_AHTBYRM_000_14<tab>なあ<var 29 EB02 /var>……
見てくれよ、これが今、俺たちが建造してる
霊災後初となる新造船「ヴィクトリー号」さ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_AHTBYRM_000_15<tab>We may have lost the bulk of our ships that fateful day, but starting with this beauty, we <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> restore the Maelstrom's fleet to its former glory. The <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var> is more than a simple warship─it is the symbol of Limsa Lominsa's rebirth from the wreckage wrought by the coming of the Seventh Umbral Era.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_AHTBYRM_000_15<tab>霊災では、多くの船が沈んじまったが……
こいつから黒渦艦隊の再建が始まるんだ！
まさに、リムサ・ロミンサの復興の象徴ってわけさ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_AHTBYRM_000_16<tab>Thus we are striving to complete her construction as swiftly as possible, even going so far as to hire veteran shipwrights from outside the thalassocracy.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_AHTBYRM_000_16<tab>だから、俺たちゃ一刻も早く
こいつを完成させなきゃなんねえ。
そのために、腕利きの職人を各地からかき集めてる。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_AHTBYRM_000_17<tab>Yet even with such unprecedented measures, there are never enough hands to handle the abundance of tasks. Should you choose to linger at the docks for a time, there is no end of odd jobs for a <var 1A 02 /var>hardworking<var 1A 01 /var> adventurer. Be you fair warned─there is no place here for layabouts and troublemakers.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA109_00406_AHTBYRM_000_17<tab>だが、人手はいくらあっても足りん。
冒険者のお前にも、頼みたい仕事が山とあるから、
ぜひとも協力してくれよ、頼んだぞ。
